C Programming.title: Sum of Two Numbers
C Programming.code:
#include<stdio.h>
int main(){ int a=5,b=3; printf("%d",a+b); return 0; }

Maths.title: Factorial
Maths.code:
#include<stdio.h>
int main(){ int n=5,f=1; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) f*=i; printf("%d",f); return 0; }
